block_comment: This block of code is used for conditional compilation and to instantiate a module called "generic_sram_byte_en". The instantiation is conditionally compiled only if XILINX_FPGA is not defined, which means this code is specific to non-Xilinx FPGA designs. The "generic_sram_byte_en" module is parameterized with two arguments: DATA_WIDTH that sets the width of the data bus and ADDRESS_WIDTH that determines the size of the memory that can be addressed.
